page.title: 01General Description
page.content:
The area covered by the block falls into four distinct categories:-
1) Residential - The main population centre is the village of Eastington, surrounded by a number of isolated hamlets. Total Population numbers around 1500
2) Land around the village and bordered by the M5 Motorway - at present farmed but designated for use as a housing development as and when the need arises.
3) Land bordering Stonehouse now being developed as an industrial estate.
4) The Stroudwater Canal and the River Frome.
